channel.title: Mentorship on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Mentorship on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes

item.title: CloudNativePG part of LFX Mentorship again - sign up as a mentee!
item.description: We have proposed 3 projects for the September cohort of the CNCF’s LFX Mentorship program, and we’re looking for mentees to sign up and receive a stipend for their work.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Ying Zhu
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Ying Zhu, student at Carnegie Mellon University, and CNCF mentee.

item.title: CloudNativePG part of LFX Mentorship - sign up as a mentee!
item.description: We have proposed a project for the June cohort of the CNCF’s LFX Mentorship program, and we’re looking for mentees to sign up and receive a stipend for their work.
